reviewText:
Vinegar Syndrome my respect and my support to them if you love and appreciate good video quality and you like adult content you should get The Pretty peaches Trilogy Blu-ray set i recommended, i had an experience when i saw all 3 movies with such supper video quality my review for this Blu-ray set, Movie 4 out of 5  Video 5 out of 5 Audio 4 out of 5 Overall i  enjoy it Vinegar Syndrome keep bringing more movies i want to add more to my collection i will keep saying excellent video quality 2K transfer, what they are really doing is this,  "MISSION ONE: RECOVER

At VS, were always searching for the rarest and most interesting exploitation movies we can find. With a constantly growing in-house film archive consisting of thousands of 35mm and 16mm negatives and prints, theres always a new treasure to be discovered and released.

  MISSION TWO: RESTORE

Film restoration can easily become a tricky subject especially with a lack of general consensus on how to do it right. Our goal is to as accurately as possible recreate a theatrical viewing experience. We never employ any noise/grain reduction and use digital restoration tools only to remove or reduce severe image damage. All film scanning, color grading, digital restoration and disc authoring is performed in-house by our sister company, OCN Digital Labs. Unlike other companies, we do not farm out digital restoration to India. All work is performed in the USA.

  MISSION THREE: RELEASE

Our favorite part. Constructing a completed DVD or Blu-Ray offers these films an opportunity to have a new life on home video (and theatrically, in some cases), find new fans and rediscover old ones. All of our films are available for theatrical bookings as DCP and when available, 35mm prints". That process was from Vinegar Syndrome website that's what are they doing and my support to them i recommended.

I knew nothing about the original limited edition blu ray of Pretty Peaches
So i wasn't able to grab a copy so this 2-Disc Trilogy is a good deal (Mostly if you want the complete trilogy in HD)

I only tested out disc one to scan through some scenes
Is it the same transfer from the limited version?
I'd think whatever the case the PQ is impressive it looks crisp and clean and alive (no massive print damage)
you have got to hand it Vinegar Syndrome this small rogue distributing company has major respect for the 1970's underground scene
The blu ray case is the clear case (Arrow Video has been using for a few years)
The only major negative regarding this version is lack of any extras (you just get all three films uncut and uncensored)

Pretty Peaches was originally released on dvd on July 2006 by Alpha Blue Productions
Cast include  Desiree Cousteau, Eileen Welles, Holly McCall, John Leslie,
Juliet Anderson, Mimi Morgan, Nancy Hoffman, Sharon Kane

Peaches is a daffy carefree female who cheerfully plunges through life without any worries. After attending her father's wedding, she has an accident in her jeep that leaves her unconscious. Two guys find her and immediately take advantage of their good luck. It turns out that Peaches has amnesia, so the fellows offer to help her. The plot revolves around all the silly circumstances and schemes they come up with, and her resolve to keep on smiling through it all. Alex De Renzy regards Pretty Peaches as one of his best all around films.

Pretty Peaches 2 previously on dvd released on May 2002 by VCA Classics
Cast include:
Ashley Brown, Buck Adams, F.M. Bradley, Jamie Gillis, Janette Littledove, Melissa Melendez, Peter North, Ron Jeremy, Siobhan Hunter, Tami White, Tracy Adams

Poor Peaches. She's almost 20 and she's never been laid. And that's bad news for a beautiful, curious girl like Peaches. What she needs is a good sexual vacation, so she packs it up and heads to San Francisco to visit her strange Uncle Howard. On the way, she meets a horny trucker with a taste for big-busted hookers. What she sees will knock your socks off! Once in Frisco, Peaches is served up a veritable buffet of carnal delights. From a group grope with Uncle Howard's family to an exotic anal experience in a mysterious Chinatown brothel. Peaches is spared no detail in her erotic education. And that's only the beginning! Only Alex de Renzy could serve up a tale as hot and hilarious as Pretty Peaches 2.

Pretty Peaches 3: The Quest previously released on dvd on December 1999 by VCA
Cast include  Don Fernando, Eric Price, Jamie Gillis, Keisha, Lynn Lemay, Marc Wallice,
Mike Horner, Rachel Ryan, Tianna, Tracy Adams, Victoria Paris

This time Peaches is on a search for spiritual enlightenment; a search which will take her from the offices of crazed nymphomaniac psychiatrists to oversexed, corrupt evangelists to horny groping gurus. Will Peaches reach San Francisco with her soul - and sensuality - intact?

I give lots of respect to Vinegar Syndrome for doing what no other major studio is even trying to do
Releases like this could in fact bring money back to big name studios (why nobody else is trying this i really don't understand)
This is a must have for collectors and the best PQ you'll ever see the complete Pretty Peaches Trilogy  10/10
of classic porn. Veteran cast from adult entertainment from yesteryear.

A friend recommended this for me to watch. I was surprised at how sharp the detail in this movie is, being filmed such a long time ago. There is a lot of film grain but personally, I found it to be very subtle. Viewed this on a 50" screen in 1080P. Was very pleased with the picture quality. The acting, dialogue and story are typical for movies in this genre: mediocre and lacking. This was my first time hearing about/seeing Desiree Cousteau. She is amazing.

Getting down to it: there is a lot of nudity, many many sex scenes and fan service (not as much teasing as Tinto Brass' movies).
My fault for buying a blue ray when I wanted it in DVD format. Wasn't able to watch it.
Great price
First one was okay but 2 and 3 were terrific. 2 was like no other movie I'd ever seen before (in an good way) while 3 was hella trippy. MUST SEE!!! Buy this!!!!
First one is the best.
Desiree Cousteau lovers will ove this.
On time and in good condition.  Sound and picture quality Okay but could be better.
The Pretty Peaches trilogy is a great set to own this is a very good adult movie set to own if you like these kind of movie it is well worth the price to pay and the bl ray is excellent.

Don't listen to the lame brain critiques about the "graininess" of the films.  For starters, the Grain is the film not some bad transferring glitch.  Vhs has no grain, the colors bleed if the quality is bad.  Vinegar Syndrome has done a commendable job at restoring these fine films to better quality than when they were first released in theaters.  If you're tired of the mechanical boredom of today's adult films, may i suggest seeing these instead where both plot and action are done with taste?  Adult films were originally made by serious filmmakers and actors who had trouble speaking their voices in traditional Hollywood.  The Golden Age (early 1970's are a great starting point, also check out The Rialto Report.com for great interviews from the pioneers of this field) of Adult Films are still the best of its kind, give them a whirl!
This is a great tripple feature for a great price .I enjoyed all three .if you like porn that has a story and great sex seens.this is for you .highly recomend

Not what I expected.  Expected nudity but not hard core action.  This is in porn movie. No soft core or walk by shots.  So I'll review it as what it is and not what I thought it was.  Most women are average. Few are slightly above average.
Makeup is awful. Pointless to review acting.
Camera work and angles are done well for the most part. I would opt for newer pron instead of bad makeup and outdated hair styles.
My husband was very pleased.

I was very disappointed when I watched this one disc was so terrible then all of a sudden it looked better. They didn't do a good job of quality to make sure all the movies where in great shape when you watch them. Bad QA job.
This film, is so awesome to be watching in High Definition!!! I mostly like watching the Parts 2 & 3!!!

I'm extremely happy with this set.  Ok, yes the quality of the 2 and 3 in the trilogy is a bit more grainy, but it's not VHS quality grainy, it's just not quite as good film as the first movie used.  The lighting is still good and for me at least in the second movie the action makes up for the slightly rougher video quality.  It's really only the third movie that I found a little bit disappointing in that the action has become a bit choppy and a bit more of the fast pounding than I like, and not as much of the measured, firm, meaningful thrusting.  But the first Pretty Peaches is amazing and even the second one is very good, well worth the price of this Blu-ray set.

I have to say I'm amazed I've never seen Desiree Cousteau before ... because OMFG she is STUNNING!  She's so hot that I didn't even mind that she does half her scenes acting with less than full consent (not to mention, a weird enema scene).  Stacked, buxom, voluptuous... none of these terms for me quite capture the delicious fleshy curves of hers.  Nicest thighs and butt and venus mound I think I've ever seen, and what a cute face and cute short hair to go with it.  There are many scenes for everyone, and the final orgy scene is incredible with lots of partner swapping and everyone is oiled up...

The second movie again has lots of scenes, lots of beautiful women including a plump redhead that really, really got me going.  Good action, nice camera work, some stars you will recognize... really amazing stuff.  And the thing with both of these first two movies is, you really start feeling excited above the waist as well as below, simply because the quality of everything is so good (and maybe a little from the nostalgia too).  Before this stuff was on Blu-ray we either had to suffer the horribly diminished effect of VHS, or maybe at least get half-way decent quality on DVD but still nothing like how aroused the original film could get you.  This is just VERY exciting!
Very good remastering for the first two films.  The third was a good copy of a VHS.  Very adult..ahem...films.

Sortie stupfiante de qualit, artistique d'une part, mais galement principalement par son rendu visuel d'une grande acuit considrant les sources d'origine (mme si le 16/9 fait invitablement perdre un peu de message en haut et en bas). Alors, ces trois films demeurent aujourd'hui d'un grand intrt dans ce genre o l'ambition, le talent et le bon got se doivent de primer pour perdurer: Avec De RENZY c'est naturellement le cas (l'humour et la virtuosit en plus), et mme si le fameux premier opus peut paratre un brin vieillot (compar avec l'excellent 'Baby face' de l'anne prcdente), il reste tout de mme des plus attrayant, le second tant parfait et le troisime toujours fort troublant. En somme, une sortie fameuse pour l'aficionado exigeant!

L'argument? dans chacun de ces trois films pour adultes, une jeune fille 'se cherche': dans le premier, ayant perdue la mmoire elle cherche naturellement  la retrouver, dans le second, elle cherche simplement  s'manciper sexuellement, puis  s'accomplir spirituellement dans le troisime. Evidemment de joyeux drilles essaieront de s'en amuser, de vilains lascars essayant, eux, d'en abuser mme vnalement
(nous sommes un peu dans le cas de figure du film 'Candy', opus aventureux dlirant de Marquand). Bref, entre 'Candide' et 'Alice au pays des merveilles' (si l'on peut dire) pour schmatiser.. enfin, petite prcision pour le nophyte: avec De Renzy, on ne s'ennuie jamais!

[2 Blu-ray de grande qualit, tant visuelle (image somptueuse, trs dfinie, quilibre, le bitrate tant tonnament lev), que sonore (assez toff); une simple bande annonce en supplment, hlas rien sur le ralisateur..]

Nice to see these Old Porno classics from days of Yore on 'Bluray. I remembered thinking these were really quite raunchy, back in the eighties. How times have changed. With the bar being raised all of the time in the Porn industry to generate sales, these films seem almost stepped up episodes of Benny Hill.
Alex de Renzy directs all three, & they are whimsical with attractive & well known Porn actresses of the day, indulging in what comes reasonably naturally.
Picture quality was quite good too. Although I only remembered the worn VHS copies, full of sound bars & dropped frames. Superb!

Some portions of each film are very grainy in spots, disappointing to have paid what I did for the quality received. Not sure what the remastering in 2k is all about as it should have restored the entire film of each movie included. I'm at a loss as to how some segments are crystal clear and some are grainy as all he**!
Overrated, tries to hard to be funny,ugly people,blasphemous and bad dialogue and disgusting incestous storylines. that goes for all 3 movies. transfer is horrible and really overrated to begin with.
I think this is an amazing quality restoration production by Vinegar Syndrome. Thoroughly enjoyed and happy with my purchase, an oldie but goody from way back when adult film was is its hey day.
Cool movies, great addition to my movies collection.
The DVD is exactly as advertised & arrived promptly. Thank you.
Quality
did not watch. it was a gift.
I saw the first one when I was a kid, it's awesome.  The other two are not so good.  Too bad adult film makers have dropped storylines.
The trilogy gave the viewers a lot of eye candy. Never mind if the plot was outrageous,just enjoy the view.
Good old DVDs would have been better - this subject matter doesn't really need to be in blu-ray.
Excellent product + delivery!
